item.title: Don't use spreadsheets for more than what they are for
item.description: I am surprised by how often spreadsheets are used for things they are not really good for when there are better alternatives.

item.title: Map making with R
item.description: Maps have been part of human history for a long time; representing the real world on paper and now via the web. The process should be simple, but itâ€™s often challenging to non-GIS people. Software such as ArcGIS and QGIS have made map making an easy process, while you will need a license to use the former, the latter is a free and open-source software (FOSS). However, R - a statistical programming language has spatial capabilities that can be used for map making.

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Right here is the place where I share my analytical and programming projects, using languages and tools such as R, Python, ArcGIS, QGIS etc. In future, I plan to have a tutorial section for more detailed introduction into a topic. Please feel free to contact me if you have exciting suggestions or questions!
